timeline.content: Let's see if I can get this blog started this time.
So removed Chrome for Edge. Long term will switch to Firefox.
New domain name, Svelte + Github + Netlify. Let's see how it goes.
Simply put, Linux mint is much faster than Windows

github.dev is a relevation to me. On github, browse to the file you want to edit. Change the url from .com  to .dev and an online vscode editor opens up to edit the file. Amazing!! Makes life much simpler for quick edits.

While adding a new column to an existing table,if you want to prefill it with it's default constraint, you can use 'with values' while creating the column.
eg:
>alter table {tablename} add {newColumn} uniqueidentifier default( newID() ) with values
